note.p: Coach builder. Had premises at Tyrrell Road, Peckham Rye, Surrey, in the 1870s, and supplied CD with a coach in 1877.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/678/4/1)
Certificate of death, 2 September 1887, Camberwell, Surrey (General Register Office, England)
Post Office directory of the six home counties 1874
